name: Marc Calder
note:
Company Name: BACA Workwear & Safety 
Company Website: https://www.veltuff.com/Default.aspx
Contact Person: Marc Calder 
Product: VELTUFF® is high quality workwear that delivers both safety, comfort and style.
The VELTUFF® collection includes clothing, hi-vis garments, safety footwear and gloves, all available in a variety of sizes and styles.
From the type of material and thread, all the way through to individual zips and buttons, every element is designed with features that deliver safety, style, durability and comfort to the end user.
Services Provided: The VELTUFF® team carries out ongoing research and development, continuously refining and improving the range in order to ensure that the finished product is truly fit for purpose.
Country-Location: across Europe
Target Audience: European 
Immediate Requirement: personal assistant with different languages.
Next Step: Send CVs of candidates with great English, German, Italian, Spanish, French languages and all necessary information about the company.
Next Contact Date: Keep in touch by email.
can we have a zoom call to discuss in more detail what services you offer?
If you send me your email address we can talk at 5.30pm UK time if it works for you?
5.30 is good for me...what is your email address please. 

I guess he wants to create an event on zoom on his own

name: Felix Schröder
note:
Прислать ему прайс на менеджеров возможно менеджер и дизайнер в одном лице. Работает в основном на немецком, готов развивать англ рынок. Офис в Мюнхене. Возможно наймет человека который бы адаптировал их паверпоинт презентации под каждого клиента. Говорил ему цены в евро типа 600 евро за менеджера 700 за дизайнера, он сказал что для дизайнера на полную ставку врядли есть задания я предложил напополам типа один чел который будет делать дизайн и лидогенерацию. Людей с немецким тоже возьмет. Industry:: IndustryMarketing and Advertising.8-910.2019 было себеседование: Результат: Феликс объяснил суть работы: Добавление лидов в Линкеде и ХING. Общение в чате на сайте. Редактирование презентаций. тестовое отправит позже. Собеседование с Феликсов и Владимиром Стецюком прошло. Феликс уже взять Владимира. Провела Екатерина Юхно. Взял Владимира Стецюка

Fresh results : Our company is currently working with the client.(29.01.2021)

client_candidates.comment: Oksana: she confidently told about her previous working experience and explained her own LG strategy in English.
Rostyslav: told about his previous responsibilities being a researcher, also told about some tools he used and his current workflow.
Aleksei: has good English verbal skills, so he was able to describe his background with the details.
Sergii was very confident and answer all the questions. He described his previous experience on other projects and give detailed description of seraching information.
Alona was really good, she explained all the working process step by step. It was a lot of questions which she tried to answer, but was a little confused.
Oriana is less experienced than other candidates and she didn't answer all the questions, but was pretty good in communication.

employment_statuses.name: Full Time

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
We interviewed candidates for Chatchamp company: 


Candidates for LG Manager’s position:


Oksana https://app.rh-s.com/oksana-k

(CRM, Canva, Twitter, Facebook, Linked In, Google Search Console)


Aleksei https://app.rh-s.com/aleksei-ge

(1C, CRM, Jira, Slack, Inshot, Discord, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Sony Vegas, Google Docs, Translation, Voice acting, Sales Navigator, Microsoft office)


Rostyslav https://app.rh-s.com/rostyslav-m

(CRM, Slack, GitHub, Hubspot, Linked In, Microsoft Excel, Sales Navigator, Google Spreadsheet, Google Search Console)


Oksana: she confidently told about her previous working experience and explained her own LG strategy in English.


Aleksei: has good English verbal skills, so he was able to describe his background with the details.


Rostyslav: told about his previous responsibilities being a researcher, also told about some tools he used and his current workflow.


Responsibilities (LG): to find out some leads in LinkedIn Sales Navigator mostly from German and Austria as well as other German-speaking countries; to get their or company’s emails; to fill the data using Google Sheets; using their email, write to these leads; to keep the communication with them; to try finding the potential customers.


Conclusion: The client mostly liked Oksana, so he is going to start with her immediately. He will pass this info to his CEO and will return to us.


Next Contact Day: We will have one more conversation with the client by email as well as at the introductory call (probably today or asap), 04.08.23. 


SM Julia

SA Inna

LG Юхно/Ежелева Екатерина Игоревна

type.name: Interview
type.description: это состоявшийся звонок, при проведении которого встретились клиент и кандидаты для найма

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
We just had an introductory call with Chatchamp and Oksana.


During the call we define the main responsibilities for Oksana :


1) to find out some leads in LinkedIn Sales Navigator mostly from German and Austria as well as other German-speaking countries; 


2) to get their or company’s emails; to fill the data using Google Sheets; using their email, write to these leads; to keep the communication with them;


3) to try finding the potential customers.


They exchange all accesses after signing the agreement (today, in the aftrnoon).



https://docs.google.com/document/d/18mWaUpvvzlG4WVe1sR-U6-sTH13E9vWaqtyGwA0wqZ4/edit


SM Julia (Inna)

type.name: Introductory call
type.description: звонок после подписания контракта и перед началом проэкта, где обсуждаются таски на первые дни, основные задания и доступы

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
Alona was really good, she explained all the working process step by step. It was a lot of questions which she tried to answer, but was a little confused. 



Candidates for replacement:


Sergii https://www.rh-s.com/marketers/lead-generation-manager/sergii-t/ 


Alona https://www.rh-s.com/sales/lead-generation-manager/alona-a/ 


Orіiana https://www.rh-s.com/sales/lead-generation-manager/or%D1%96iana-d/ 


Yana https://www.rh-s.com/sales/lead-generation-manager/yana-v/


Responsibilities: Searching for potential clients, emails, working with Sales Navigator, Pover Point, Google Sheets.


Sergii was very confident and answer all the questions. He described his previous experience on other projects and give detailed description of seraching information.


Alona was really good, she explained all the working process step by step. It was a lot of questions which she tried to answer, but was a little confused. 


Oriana is less experienced than other candidates and she didn't answer all the questions, but was pretty good in communication.


Yana was good as always. She do not talk much but has good experience and the client like it. 


Сhristoph and Felix need some time to discuss their decision internally and will come back with an answer shortly.


SM Julia


SA Inna

note:
Лід знайшов на сайті тільки лідгенів, вони теж підходять з англійською для йошл потреб, але можливо треба піднести лідгена як менеджера, тоді ві погодиться)

name: Rosa Reigosa Novaton
note:
Vlada Bezridna   9:29 AM
Hi Rosa,

It's great connecting with you!

I represent an outstaffing company Remote Helpers.
We provide our clients all over the world with remote employees. We would like to offer you our candidates for hire who are available to work in the following positions: Developers(Back-End, Front-End, Full-Stack, QA Testers), Lead Generation Managers, Personal Assistants, Social Media Managers, Designers, SEO Managers, Video Editors, Recruiters etc.

We can set a call to see if we can find a fit for you and of course explain our model if you are interested.

Dec 22, 2024
Rosa Reigosa Novaton sent the following message at 12:37 PM
